teaser: A true orange classic. Perfect for your summer. Easy and quick, fresh and fruity.
title: Screw Driver

recipe.recipe1: Find a suitable glass. Typically served in a coupe glass.
recipe.recipe2: Squeeze 2 oranges.
recipe.recipe3: Add vodka to glass with ice cubes.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with orange.
recipe.recipe5: Done. Simple as that. Enjoy it.

body: A Screwdriver is the classic Vodka Juice that we all know and love. A Screwdriver is incredibly simple to make and can easily be enjoyed even if you are not too fond of vodka, as the juice goes away and hides the strong traces of alcohol in the drink. The drink has also been named by The International Bartenders Association as one of their official cocktails.

teaser: Perfect for a warm summer day. Grape, refreshing and well-tasting.
title: Nordic Pamola

recipe.recipe1: Fill a highball glass with ice.
recipe.recipe2: Pour in your Akvavit
recipe.recipe3: Now fill it with the delicius grape soda.
recipe.recipe4: Decorate with a sliced grape. Enjoy.

body: Nordic Pamola is our take on the classic grape drink, but with our delicious FROST aquavit instead of tequila. The drink offers both sweet and bitter flavors, including from the pink grape soda. Enjoy this cocktail all year round.

teaser: James Bond's favorite drink. A tart and refreshing drink that should be enjoyed ice cold. Shaken, not stirred.
title: Vodka Martini

recipe.recipe1: Find your best Martini glass, cool it in the freezer for a better experience.
recipe.recipe2: Fill it with plenty of ice.
recipe.recipe3: Pour the ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake it for around 10 sec.
recipe.recipe4: Pour out the ice from the glass and strain it over the cooled glass.
recipe.recipe5: Decorate with olives or lemon zest and enjoy.

body: Iconic, classic, and refreshing - with our own twist. James Bond's go-to. Shaken, not stirred. A super simple cocktail that is elegant and has a razor-sharp balance between the ingredients, where our quality vodka really shines.

third.title: lemon zest or olives for decorations

teaser: An invigorating, tart, and refreshing drink that should be enjoyed ice cold. Perfect for the coffee lover.
title: Espresso Martini

recipe.recipe2: Fill the shaker with vodka and coffee liqueur. Add cold espresso.
recipe.recipe3: Fill the shaker with ice and shake well
recipe.recipe4: Serve the drink in a chilled glass.
recipe.recipe5: Gently place the coffee beans on the foam.

body: For the coffee-loving cocktail enthusiast. A full-bodied drink, full of flavor and with silky foam on top. You rarely go wrong when serving espresso martini.

teaser: A refreshing ginger drink. Combines the freshness of lime with the strong notes of ginger.
title: Kiev Mule

recipe.recipe1: Find a suitable glass. Typically served in a copper mug, but a lowball will also do just fine.
recipe.recipe2: Fill the glass with crushed ice.
recipe.recipe3: Pour lime juice and vodka over the ice.
recipe.recipe4: Top with ginger beer.
recipe.recipe5: Garnish with lime and serve.

body: A well-known classic, but damn good nonetheless. A cocktail that suits most occasions and which, with its refreshing notes of lime, is perfect on a warm summer evening.

teaser: The creamy classic. A well-rounded taste and perfect for a cold winter's day.
title: White Russian

recipe.recipe2: Pour all ingredients in a shaker and fill it with ice.
recipe.recipe4: Strain the drink over the glass.
recipe.recipe5: Serve. Drink. Enjoy.

body: A creamy and rich drink. An obvious choice to serve in the winter months. This cocktail is the perfect combination of bitterness from the coffee and sweetness from the whole milk or cream, giving a round pleasant taste.

teaser: A refreshing hot ginger classic with a twist. Perfect for warm evenings and summer days in the garden.
title: Stormy Bornholmer

recipe.recipe2: Pour the Sevablødda in the glass.
recipe.recipe3: Fill it with delicious Ginger Beer
recipe.recipe4: Press some lime juice in the glass.
recipe.recipe5: Decorate with a slice of lime.

body: As the name suggests, perfect for those late summer evenings or dark late nights. A cozy and relaxing cocktail that gives a warm touch from the ginger. A true classic, with a little traditional Bornholm twist - that definitely makes it better. It is fresh, spicy and can be enjoyed on both rainy or sunny days

teaser: Foamy, creamy and sour classic with a traditional Danish twist.
title: Akva Sour

recipe.recipe2: Shake well and fill the glass with ice.
recipe.recipe4: Decorate the cocktail with a slice of dehydrated lemon

body: Foamy, creamy and sour classic with a traditional Danish twist in the form of our traditional Bornholm Clear Akvavit. Can be enjoyed all year round, and is perfect for almost any occasion. Simple comfort that hits really well after dinner or for dessert, because of its sweet taste.

teaser: Foamy, creamy and sour classic with a traditional Danish twist.
title: FROST Akva Sour

recipe.recipe2: Shake well and fill the glass with ice.
recipe.recipe4: Decorate the cocktail with a slice of dehydrated lemon

body: Foamy, creamy and sour classic with a traditional Danish twist in the form of our traditional FROST Akvavit. Can be enjoyed all year round, and is perfect for almost any occasion. Simple comfort that hits really well after dinner or for dessert, because of its sweet taste.

teaser: A classic with a Danish twist. Spicy, bitter, sweet and refreshing.
title: Nordic Negroni

recipe.recipe2: Pour in all the ingredients.
recipe.recipe3: Stir a few times with a spoon..
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with orange peel.

body: The mixture of our traditional Bornholmer Akvavit, sweet vermouth and Campari orange gives the cocktail a sweet, bitter and refreshing taste that is perfect for a cozy evening - or simply an evening where the hips are a little loose. Popular classic with a local Bornholm twist that takes it to new heights.

teaser: Everyone knows it. Everyone likes it. With a Nordic twist.
title: Nordic Mojito

recipe.recipe2: Put the limewedges and sugarsyrup in the glass and mash them with a muddler.
recipe.recipe3: Smash the mint leaves between your hands, put them in the glass and mash a little more.
recipe.recipe4: Add Akvavit and crushed ice in the glass.
recipe.recipe5: Top it with sparkling water and garnish with mint leaves.

body: The mouth-watering, fresh and sweet cocktail. We've spiced it up a bit and replaced the pale rum with our refreshing FROST Akvavit. Try it before your neighbor..

teaser: En favorit for mange, med vores take.
title: Sea Buckthorn G&T

recipe.recipe1: Fill a coupe glass with plenty of ice.
recipe.recipe2: Pour all the ingredients in the glass.
recipe.recipe3: Garnish with frozen sea buckthorn berries.
recipe.recipe4: Enjoy.

body: The best of both worlds. The fresh cocktail is a result of sour flavors from the sea buckthorn combined with the bitter tonic and is a real winner. The cocktail gets its beautiful color from the orange-yellow berries and decorates any table.

teaser: An elegant and refreshing champagne cocktail to treat you and your guests.
title: Champagne Fizz

recipe.recipe1: Pour sugar, lemon juice, gin and egg whites into a shaker with lots of ice.
recipe.recipe2: Shake thoroughly.
recipe.recipe3: Strain the cocktail over a tall champagne glass.
recipe.recipe4: Top with champagne.
recipe.recipe5: Serve. Drink. Enjoy.

body: The elegant, flavorful cocktail is good for most occasions. The cocktail has the perfect combination of sweetness, freshness and a bit of bitterness, which makes it a true star cocktail.

teaser: Refreshing lime-taste with a twist. The Mojito comes in many variations - here is ours.
title: Gin Mojito

recipe.recipe1: Fill a coupe glass with lots of ice.
recipe.recipe2: Strike the mint leaves between your hands a few times.
recipe.recipe3: Pour syrup and gin into the glass.
recipe.recipe4: Top up with sparkling water.
recipe.recipe5: Serve. Drink. Enjoy.

body: A classic in new clothes. A refreshing and (dangerously) mouthwatering cocktail that is always a hit. Replace the rum with our delicious gin with sweet notes and serve a sure winner for your guests.

teaser: Perfect for a hot summer day. Our beloved G&T in a frozen version.
title: Frozen Sea Buckthorn G&T

recipe.recipe1: Mix the gin, tonic and lime juice in a frost-proof container.
recipe.recipe2: Freeze the liquid until it forms a solid mass.
recipe.recipe3: Break the frozen G&T into smaller pieces.
recipe.recipe4: Put them in a blender and blend until the frozen mass has turned into smaller crystals.
recipe.recipe5: Pour your cocktail into a coupe glass and top with sea buckthorn juice.
recipe.recipe6: Garnish with a sprig of burning rosemary and enjoy.

body: Our frozen G&T is always a hit on a hot summer day. When the heat wave is upon us, there's no better way to cool down than with this cocktail in hand and a few good friends.

teaser: Bittersweet, herbaceous flavor with a bold, refreshing taste. It is a sophisticated cocktail with a unique flavor profile
title: Weekend Negroni

recipe.recipe2: Pour all ingredients over the ice.

body: Hard work week? Enjoy the iconic Italian drink and relax, it's the weekend. The bitter notes from the Campari are combined with the sweetness of our fantastic gin. Try it!

teaser: Fly in the seventh heaven with this brilliant flyver drink. A Danish classic.
title: Flyver Sjus

recipe.recipe2: Pour all ingredients over the ice.

body: When you need to fly high, this is your go-to cocktail. It's easy to make and just as easy to drink. Perfect for many guests, so you don't have to spend your entire evening in the kitchen.

teaser: A fruity and refreshing version of the classic G&T. We promise you won't be disappointed.
title: Fruity G&T

recipe.recipe2: Pour gin over the ice.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with a handful of frozen sea buckthorn berries and a mint leaf.

body: A fruity and refreshing cocktail. A twist on the classic G&T, where you end up with a result that is best enjoyed on a late summer day in good company.

teaser: Notes of sea buckthorn, dill, and cucumber are the perfect addition to any party. Delight disguised in a cocktail.
title: Yellow Heaven

liqour.title: Sea Buckthorn, dill and cucumber snaps

recipe.recipe1: Fill a tall glass with ice.
recipe.recipe2: Pour the shot over the ice.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with a slice of cucumber.

body: Yes, snaps can actually be used in cocktails, and it tastes great. This fresh cocktail with notes of sea buckthorn, dill, and cucumber is the perfect addition to any party.

liqour.title: Sea Buckthorn, dill and cucumber snaps

teaser: The fantastic powerful drink with notes of licorice, to make it even better.
title: Licorice Espresso Martini

recipe.recipe2: Add snaps, hot espresso, and coffee liqueur.
recipe.recipe4: Strain into a coupe glass.
recipe.recipe5: Garnish with coffee beans and enjoy.

body: A creamy affair with notes of licorice. This cocktail is perfect for a cool winter day or as an after-dinner cocktail on Christmas Eve.

teaser: You know the lollipops. Now you can enjoy them as a cocktail.
title: Kongen Af Danmark

recipe.recipe1: Chill a martini glass with ice.
recipe.recipe2: Fill a shaker with ice and add all ingredients.
recipe.recipe4: Strain over the chilled glass.
recipe.recipe5: Garnish with star anise and enjoy.

body: Perhaps this cocktail should be Denmark's national drink. The red color from the snaps, combined with the white foam, is enough to bring tears to your eyes, and the taste is just as good. The sweetness of the rhubarb and the licorice notes of the star anise are a star combination.

teaser: Passion = summer. Now you can enjoy summer in a drink.
title: Nordic Passion

recipe.recipe2: Add snaps, passion fruit syrup, and lime juice.
recipe.recipe4: Top with sparkling water.
recipe.recipe5: Garnish with passion fruit and enjoy.

body: This cocktail tastes like summer and should be enjoyed in the summer. It blends the sweetness of figs with the tartness of passion fruit, resulting in a fantastic flavor.

teaser: A classic. A favorite. A winner
title: No3 & Tonic

recipe.recipe1: Fill a glass with ice cubes.
recipe.recipe2: Add snaps.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with dehydrated lime and enjoy.

body: This is another classic cocktail. It is bitter and it is good. We have added faint notes of figs to compliment the bitter tonic and we think it's a bit of a hit. Judge for yourself.

teaser: FGet your legs knocked out from under you with this strong but still fresh Spicy Margarita.
title: Spicy Magarita

recipe.recipe2: Add all the ingrdients.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with a lime wheel and enjoy.

body: For all the chili lovers out there, now there is a cocktail. Here you go. The Spicy Margarita is made with our fantastic chili snaps and is a hit at any party. Surprise and indulge your guests with this delicious cocktail.

teaser: Celebrate national pride with a Dannebrog, you won't be disappointed.
title: Dannebrog

recipe.recipe2: Pour the snaps over the ice.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with a lemon wheel and enjoy.

body: There is a lovely country. And a lovely cocktail. The best cocktail when you want to celebrate Denmark, whether it's for Christmas, New Year's Eve, or when the national team is playing. You can never go wrong with this cocktail.

teaser: Beets, chili, vanilla, and skyr?! This sounds like a wild combination, but it tastes absolutely fantastic.
title: Beet Special

recipe.recipe2: Pour in all the ingredients.
recipe.recipe4: Pour into a martini glass.
recipe.recipe5: Garnish with bellflowers and enjoy.

body: A beet delight. A creamy and powerful drink where the sweetness of the beets is matched by our exquisite chili snaps. It sounds crazy, but it tastes great and it has a well-rounded taste with an exquisite flavorprofile.

teaser: A spicy tonic. A delicious cocktail.
title: Spiced Tonic

recipe.recipe2: Pour the snaps over the ice.
recipe.recipe4: Squeeze a grapefruit wheel over the cocktail and enjoy.

body: Snaps and spicy tonic. This cocktail should be on everyone's bucket list. The perfect combination of bitterness and spiciness.

teaser: Fresh cocktail, with silky soft foam. Whats not to like.
title: St. Germain Foam

recipe.recipe1: Pour all the ingrediens into a shake
recipe.recipe2: Shake thoroughly for minimum 10 sec.
recipe.recipe3: Fill a glass with ice and strain the cocktail over the ice.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with a feather of dill and enjoy.

body: A creamy, full-bodied drink. A natural choice for Easter, where dill and sea buckthorn are a good match for the fish table. The cucumber provides freshness and the result is a refreshing, creamy cocktail.

liqour.title: Sea Buckthorn, dill and cucumber snaps

teaser: It is sweet, both to look at and in taste.
title: Sweet Child

recipe.recipe2: Pour all the ingredients over the ice
recipe.recipe3: Garnish with pomegranate seeds and enjoy

body: The sweetest cocktail in the class. Raspberries and pomegranate are perfectly complimented by the ginger and, together with the red soda, create a beautiful drink.

teaser: Sweet and salty and everything nice from this world.
title: Blooming Fig

recipe.recipe2: Pour all the ingredients over the ice.
recipe.recipe3: Stir well so that the cream and caramel are mixed with the other ingredients.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with a mint broom and enjoy.

body: A dream in a glass. Salted caramel and fig is a combination you should not deprive yourself of. The cream provides the creaminess and makes this cocktail perfect to enjoy in the dark winter months.

teaser: As the name suggests, should be enjoyed on a hot summer day.
title: Hot Summer

recipe.recipe2: Pour the snaps and soda over the ice.
recipe.recipe3: Garnish with dehydrated blood orange and enjoy.

body: Cool down on a hot day or start the party by serving this refreshing, captivating cocktail. It tastes as good as it looks. And it looks pretty fucking good.

teaser: And elegant and at least just as tastefull cocktail.
title: Diamond Snaps

recipe.recipe1: Pour the snaps and one sugarcube in a tall champagne glass.
recipe.recipe2: Muddle the sugarcube and make sure it is dissolved in the snaps.
recipe.recipe4: Sprinkle four drops of Angustora over the cocktail and enjoy.

body: Captivate your guests with this beautiful and flavorful champagne cocktail. Perfect for when you want to be a little more fancy and it tastes heavenly. You can be sure that your guests will leave the party satisfied after tasting Diamond Snaps.

teaser: Sweet and creamy. Just like we like it.
title: Vanilla Love

recipe.recipe2: Add all the ingredients to the shaker.
recipe.recipe4: Strain over a cooled coupe glass and enjoy.

body: Go back to your ancient roots and toast with your ancestors in the Viking's preferred drink - mjød. This creamy delight is perfect after a busy work week. Put your feet up and enjoy a Vanilla Love.

teaser: Licoricedrink on fire.
title: Licorice Fire

recipe.recipe1: Fill a tall glass with ice.
recipe.recipe2: Add all the ingrdients.
recipe.recipe3: Garnish with licorice root and enjoy

body: Who doesn't love licorice? Maybe Americans, but that's okay. This cocktail is all you need when you want to have a cozy evening. Whether it's with your better half, your mother-in-law, or a few of your friends, this cocktail is a sure winner.

teaser: Copenhagen, I've never seen you look this bright.
title: Red Copenhagen

recipe.recipe1: Fill a lowball glass with ice.
recipe.recipe2: Add snaps and Vermouth.
recipe.recipe3: Sprinkle two drops of Angustora Bitters over the cocktail.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with lemon zest and enjoy.

body: Celebrate our amazing capital with this amazing drink. You can listen to København by Ulige Numre while you're drinking it to really turn up the atmosphere.

teaser: Summer in a glass.
title: Summer In The Sun

recipe.recipe1: Fill a lowball glass with ice.
recipe.recipe2: Add all the ingrdients.

body: Chili + honey = good taste. This cocktail combines strong chili with sweet honey and the result is this beautiful, tasty drink. You can never go wrong with it.

teaser: Like a sunset on a sunny island.
title: Golden Licorice

recipe.recipe2: Add all the ingrdients.
recipe.recipe3: Shake thoroughly and strain over a glass.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with licorice root and enjoy.

body: Imagine you're sitting on a beach on a hot day. You're watching the sunset and talking about good memories with the person you love most. That's how we think our Golden Licorice tastes. And yes, we know it's a bit pretentious, but it's the truth.

teaser: The chameleon of drinks. Goes with everything.
title: Red Pearl

recipe.recipe2: Add all the ingrdients.
recipe.recipe3: Decorate with a bunch of currants and enjoy.

body: Chili, kombucha, and lime, now that's a star combination. There simply isn't a moment when this cocktail doesn't fit in. Whether you're cozying up on the couch, having a high school reunion, or attending a grand gala, this cocktail is your friend.

teaser: Refreshing and straightforward. Everyone can enjoy this one.
title: The Golden Age

recipe.recipe2: Add lime juice and honey syrup.
recipe.recipe3: Clap the mint between your hands and add it to the cocktail.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with orange zest and enjoy.

body: A refreshing all-year-round cocktail. The refreshing lime, the strong chili, and the sweet honey make this cocktail suitable for everything. Whether it's summer, winter, spring, or fall, this cocktail is the right choice.

teaser: A creamy cocktail. A delicious cocktail.
title: The Ukrainian Dane

recipe.recipe2: Add all the ingredients to the shaker.
recipe.recipe4: Strain over a martini glass.
recipe.recipe5: Garnish with coffee chocolates and enjoy.

body: Swap your evening coffee for this delicious, creamy coffee cocktail. We guarantee it will keep you just as warm. Enjoy it in good company or when you want to treat yourself a little extra.

teaser: A refreshing spritz with an extra kick in it.
title: Vodka Spritz

recipe.recipe2: Add Vodka, Aperol and lime juice.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with dehydrated orange and enjoy.

body: You can always be sure to start the party when you serve this cocktail. Vodka, Aperol, and ginger beer together make a phenomenal combination where neither the sweetness nor the strong ginger is allowed to take over, but instead play together in a beautiful symphony.

teaser: A bubbly, light cocktail.
title: Monte Carlo

recipe.recipe2: Add Vodka, agave, limejuice, eggwhites and bitter.
recipe.recipe4: Strain over a coupe glas.
recipe.recipe5: Top with champagne.
recipe.recipe6: Garnish with a thyme sprig and enjoy.

body: This elegant, flavorful champagne cocktail is just as beautiful as it is tasty. The cocktail is perfect to serve at a party as well as for relaxation. The shaken egg whites give the cocktail a creamy consistency and soft foam.

teaser: Frugtig, frisk og sød, det er essensen af denne velsmagende cocktail.
title: Born Rebel

recipe.recipe2: Add vodka, snaps and apple juice to the glass.
recipe.recipe3: Press the kiwi og add the liquid.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with walnuts and enjoy.

body: Fresh and fruity. This cocktail, if we may say so ourselves, contains a pretty amazing combination. The sweetness from the apple, the acidity from the kiwi, and the slightly bitter taste of the walnut = perfection.

teaser: If freshness were a cocktail, it would be this tasty Danish Wall.
title: Danish Wall

recipe.recipe2: Add vodka and snaps.
recipe.recipe3: Top with freshly pressed orange juice.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with an orange wheel and enjoy.

body: The drink that makes your mouth water at first sight. A culmination of freshness and sweetness comes from freshly squeezed oranges and our legendary Vanillasnaps. A summer drink out of the ordinary and a must-try for all cocktail lovers..

teaser: It is sweet and it is delicious.
title: Green Vodka

recipe.recipe2: Add vodka, cane sugar syrup and lime.
recipe.recipe3: Grind a little pepper over the cocktail.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with basil leaves and enjoy.

body: Our green beauty. Enjoy this cocktail on warm summer days, at good parties, or in the company of family. We suggest you stock up, as our experience tells us that everyone will want more than one.

teaser: Sweet and delicious. The cocktail on top of all cocktails.
title: Orientail V

recipe.recipe2: Add vodka, chili snaps, mango puree, sugar syrup, lime and salt.
recipe.recipe4: Strain over a glass with ice.
recipe.recipe5: Top with Ginger beer.

body: Creamy? Check. Strong? Check. Delicious? Check. This cocktail is a hit with most people. The sweetness from the mango and the strength from our fantastic chili schnapps make a pretty tasty cocktail. Enjoy it at a party, at dinner, or for a cozy time.

teaser: Elegant, beautiful and tasty.
title: Flower Power

recipe.recipe1: Cool down a tall champagne glass.
recipe.recipe2: Add vodka, St. Germain and cucumber & lime tonic water.

body: Beautiful and elegant. Just as tasty. This cocktail is simple, but no less delicious. The advantage is that you don't have to stand at the bar all evening and you have even more time to mingle with your guests.

teaser: A classic. A sweet mango cocktail is never a bad idea.
title: Gin Hass

recipe.recipe1: Fill a lowball glass with ice.
recipe.recipe2: Add Gin, lemon soda and lime juice.
recipe.recipe4: Garnish with mint leaves and enjoy.

body: The cocktail that has taken Denmark by storm. The cocktail was invented by the brilliant bartender Kim Hass and can liven up any party. It's easy to make and just as tasty.

teaser: Blackberry, gin, and lemon. Delight in a cocktail glass.
title: Bramble

recipe.recipe2: Add gin, sugar syrup and lemon juice.
recipe.recipe4: Strain over a glass med ice.
recipe.recipe5: Pour Crème de mûre over the back a spoon so it settles as a layer in the cocktail.

body: The perfect balance between the sour and the sweet. The cocktail is the ultimate summer drink and should be enjoyed in good company.

teaser: The pink beauty always brings a good atmosphere.
title: Clover Club

recipe.recipe1: Pour Cointreau, Gin, syrup, lemon juice, eggwhites og 5 rasberries in a shaker with no ice.
recipe.recipe2: Shake thoroughly for minimum 10 sec.
recipe.recipe3: Add ice and shake again for 10 sec.
recipe.recipe4: Strain over a cooled glass.
recipe.recipe5: Garnish carefully with rasberries on top of the foam and enjoy.

body: The beautiful cocktail with its beautiful color will surely be well received by most people. Not only is it a delight to look at, it tastes even better.

teaser: Elegant and bubbly delicious.
title: French 75

recipe.recipe2: Add gin, sugar syrup and lemon juice.
recipe.recipe4: Strain over a tall champagne glass.
recipe.recipe5: Top with BRUT Champagne
recipe.recipe6: Garnish with a lemon wheel and enjoy.

body: An elegant classic. Bubbles, hints of lemon and well-being. This cocktail belongs at all occasions and you can be sure that your guests will enjoy the experience.

teaser: Sweet, sour and a delicious citrus flavor.
title: Gin Fizz

recipe.recipe2: Add gin, syrup, lemon juice and eggwhites.
recipe.recipe4: Strain over a glass.
recipe.recipe5: Top with sparkling water
recipe.recipe6: Garnish with a lemon wheel and enjoy.

body: A cocktail that can be enjoyed all year round and at any time of the day. It is sweet and it is sour and is a favorite among many. Treat yourself and your loved ones with a refreshing Gin Fizz.

teaser: En silkeblød cocktail med alle de dejlige noter af citrus.
title: White Lady

recipe.recipe1: Add Cointreau, Gin, syrup, lemon juice and eggwhite to a shaker with no ice.
recipe.recipe2: Shake thoroughly for minimum 10 sec.
recipe.recipe3: Add ice and shake again for 10 sec.
recipe.recipe4: Strain over a coupe glass.
recipe.recipe5: Garnish with lemon zest and enjoy.

body: It is not only good, it is also amazing to look at. It is sophisticated but not pretentious. It is everything you could want in a cocktail glass.
